title: Matplotlib 3D Quiver Plot
description: In this lab, you will learn how to create a 3D quiver plot using Python Matplotlib. A quiver plot displays a vector field as arrows. The arrows point in the direction of the vectors and their length represents the magnitude of the vectors.
